mapper.update: update project_schedule set PROJECT_ID=#{PROJECT_ID}, SCHEDULE=#{SCHEDULE}, DESCRIPTION=#{DESCRIPTION}, DATE=#{DATE}, OPER_BY=#{OPER_BY} where ID = #{ID}
mapper.select: select * from project_schedule where ID = #{ID} AND ISDEL=1
mapper.update: update project_schedule set ISDEL=2 where ID = #{ID}
mapper.select: SELECT S.*,P.DISTINGUISH,P.PROJECT_NAME AS PROJECT_NAME, D.NAME AS BIANMA_NAME, (CASE WHEN U.NAME IS NOT NULL THEN U.NAME WHEN U.NAME IS NULL THEN A.REAL_NAME END ) AS CREATE_NAME FROM project_schedule S LEFT JOIN PROJECT P ON S.PROJECT_ID=P.ID LEFT JOIN SYS_DICTIONARIES D ON S.SCHEDULE=D.BIANMA LEFT JOIN sys_user U ON S.OPER_BY=U.ID LEFT JOIN APP_USER A ON A.ID=S.OPER_BY WHERE 1=1 and S.ISDEL=1 and P.ISDEL=1
